name: Silvermane Lieutenant (Bug)
description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the leader of a squad of Belobog's Silvermane Guards.
As long as there are remaining friendly units, Silvermane Lieutenants will persistently raise a giant shield during combat. Attacking a Silvermane Lieutenant with their shield raised will result in a fierce counterattack.

skills.name: Assault
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Pierce
skills.description: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Shield Reflect
skills.description: Goes into the Counter state. When attacked by a single character, gains 1 extra turn and deals Physical DMG to the target.

skills.name: Reinforcement
skills.description: Summons Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Gunners

skills.name: Rallying
skills.description: Increases ATK for all friendly units except Silvermane Lieutenant (Error) and causes them to act immediately.
